photoeffects: My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin Tone, Darker Skin Tone, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color* *Adjustment of contrast sharpness, saturation, red, green, blue and skin tone are available Self Timer Delay: ~10 sec., ~2 sec., Custom* *Delay time (0-15 sec. (in one-second increments), 20/25/30 sec.) and number of shots (1-10 shots (in one-shot increments)) can be specified. Wireless Control: Not available

monitorsize: 76.2mm (3.0") TFT Color LCD with wide viewing angle
flashrange: 500mm - 7.0m (1.6 - 23 feet) W 500mm - 4.5m (1.6 - 15 feet) (T) Image brightness may diminish depending on shooting distance.
weight: 310g (10.9 oz) Camera Only 356g (12.6 oz) Camera, Battery and SD Memory Card as per CIPA standard
videoout: NTSC/PAL (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video), Mini-HDMI connector
audioout: Stereo (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video)
exposurecompensation: Still Images: ±3 stops in 1/3-stop increments Videos: ±3 stops in 1/3-stop increments (not available during shooting)

settings: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom 1, Custom 2 In Auto Mode, G16 automatically sets the optimal ISO speed according to shooting mode
